p.p: A set of codes to indicate the notification event subtype.

Where the EventInformation field contains:
01 - the NotificationDocumentEvent vocabulary should be used.
02 - the NotificationPatientEncounterEvent vocabulary should be used.
03 - the NotificationPatientAdministrationEvent vocabulary should be used.
Where a local code is used, the OID 2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.17.456 should be used.
